Barbell.name: Barbell Bench Press
Barbell.description: A compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.
instructions: Lie back on a flat bench holding a barbell with a medium-width grip.
Lift the barbell from the rack and hold it straight over you with your arms locked.
Lower the bar slowly until it touches your middle chest.
Push the bar back to the starting position.

Barbell.name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
Barbell.description: Targets the upper chest, shoulders, and triceps.
instructions: Set an incline bench to a 30-45 degree angle.
Lie back on the bench holding a barbell with a medium-width grip.
Lift the barbell from the rack and hold it straight over you with your arms locked.
Lower the bar slowly until it touches your upper chest.
Push the bar back to the starting position.

Dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
Dumbbell.description: A compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.
instructions: Lie back on a flat bench holding a dumbbell in each hand at chest level.
Press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the weights slowly back to the starting position.

Dumbbell.name: Incline Dumbbell Bench Press
Dumbbell.description: Targets the upper chest, shoulders, and triceps.
instructions: Set an incline bench to a 30-45 degree angle.
Lie back on the bench holding a dumbbell in each hand at chest level.
Press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the weights slowly back to the starting position.

Barbell.name: Barbell Deadlift
Barbell.description: A compound exercise that targets the lower back, glutes, and hamstrings.
instructions: Stand with your mid-foot under the barbell.
Bend over and grab the bar with a shoulder-width grip.
Bend your knees until your shins touch the bar.
Lift your chest up and straighten your lower back.
Stand up with the weight.

Barbell.name: Barbell Row
Barbell.description: Targets the middle and upper back, as well as the biceps.
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and bend your knees slightly.
Bend over at the waist, keeping your back straight, and hold a barbell with a shoulder-width grip.
Pull the barbell to your lower chest.
Lower the barbell back to the starting position.

Dumbbell.name: One-Arm Dumbbell Row
Dumbbell.description: Targets the middle and upper back, as well as the biceps.
instructions: Place one knee and hand on a bench for support.
Hold a dumbbell in the opposite hand with your arm extended.
Pull the dumbbell to your hip, keeping your back straight.
Lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.

Dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Pullover
Dumbbell.description: Targets the upper chest and back.
instructions: Lie back on a bench holding a dumbbell with both hands over your chest.
Lower the dumbbell back and over your head in an arc.
Raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.

Barbell.name: Barbell Squat
Barbell.description: A compound exercise that targets the quads, hamstrings, glutes, and lower back.
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place a barbell across your upper back.
Lower your body by bending your knees and hips, keeping your back straight.
Descend until your thighs are parallel to the floor.
Push through your heels to return to the starting position.

Barbell.name: Barbell Lunge
Barbell.description: Targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.
instructions: Stand with your feet together and place a barbell across your upper back.
Step forward with one leg and lower your body until your front thigh is parallel to the floor.
Push through your front heel to return to the starting position.
Repeat with the other leg.

Machine.name: Leg Press
Machine.description: Targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.
instructions: Sit on the leg press machine with your feet shoulder-width apart on the platform.
Lower the platform by bending your knees until your thighs are parallel to the floor.
Push the platform back to the starting position.

Machine.name: Leg Extension
instructions: Sit on the leg extension machine with your feet under the padded bar.
Extend your legs to lift the weight.
Lower the weight back to the starting position.

Dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit on a bench with back support and hold a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder level.
Press the dumbbells overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.

Dumbbell.name: Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand with a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Raise your arms out to the sides until they are at shoulder height.
Lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.

Barbell.name: Barbell Overhead Press
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell at shoulder level.
Press the barbell overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Lower the barbell back to the starting position.

Barbell.name: Barbell Upright Row
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an overhand grip.
Lift the barbell to your chest, keeping it close to your body.
Lower the barbell back to the starting position.

Dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
instructions: Stand with a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Curl the dumbbells up to shoulder level, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.

Dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Tricep Extension
instructions: Hold a dumbbell with both hands and raise it overhead.
Lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
Extend your arms to return to the starting position.

Barbell.name: Barbell Curl
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip.
Curl the barbell up to shoulder level, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Lower the barbell back to the starting position.

Barbell.name: Close-Grip Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie back on a flat bench holding a barbell with a narrow grip.
Lower the bar to your chest.
Push the bar back to the starting position.

Bodyweight.name: Plank
instructions: Get into a forearm plank position, keeping your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Hold this position for as long as possible.

Bodyweight.name: Bicycle Crunch
instructions: Lie on your back with your hands behind your head and your legs lifted.
Alternate bringing your elbow to the opposite knee while extending the other leg.
Continue this motion in a pedaling manner.

Machine.name: Cable Crunch
instructions: Kneel below a high pulley with a rope attachment.
Hold the rope and flex your waist to draw your elbows toward your thighs.
Return to the starting position.

Machine.name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended.
Raise your legs until they are parallel to the floor.
Lower your legs back to the starting position.
